narrative:
No noncompliant items identified during this 2nd pre-license inspection for a Class “C” license. 
The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the Applicant. 
 
This site is determined to be in compliance. 
All sites used for regulated activity must demonstrate full compliance with the Animal Welfare Act prior to issuance of a 
license. 
A copy of your license will be sent without any additional action on your part once all sites are determined to be in 
compliance.
